script:
1). Who are you going to hire to remodel the building?
Yes, the center is still under construction.
I'll probably go with Triple-J Contractors. 
Yes, and there's a great view of the mountains.
2). The copy machine on the third floor is out of order.
OK, I'll have the service rep take a look at it. 
I'll order some more paper right away.
We should bring it back tomorrow.
3). When did you finish testing the system?
We need to update the database.
The examination was really tough.
At about nine-thirty last night.
